articles.title: Infiltration Attempt Foiled In Jammu, Soldier Injured In Firing - NDTV
articles.description: The Indian Army foiled an infiltration attempt in the Battal sector of Jammu and Kashmir early this morning. A soldier suffered injuries in heavy firing, said the Army's XVI Corps in an online post.
articles.content:
The infiltration bid comes amid a spate of terror attacks, most of which were in Jammu. (File)

articles.description: The trends on Gift Nifty also indicate a positive start for the Indian benchmark index. The Gift Nifty was trading around 24,550 level, a premium of nearly 30 points from the Nifty futures’ previous close.
articles.content:
The Indian stock market indices are likely to open higher on Tuesday ahead of the presentation of Union Budget 2024 in the parliament today.
